text: Egha a ofa gamir gumaziba ko Livaiba akuvagha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia mangɨ Judan nguibar ekiabar itir gumazamiziba bar me mɨkɨmtɨ, me e uan Godɨn Dɨpenim akɨrsɨ dagɨabar arɨgh. Ia azenibar zurara ingangarir kam damu. Egh ia datɨrɨghɨn zuamɨra mangɨ dagɨar kaba inigh.” Ezɨ Livaiba zuamɨra ingangarir kam gamizir puvatɨ.
